title: Business Process & Customer Relationship Executive
tagsAndSkills: Customer Support,L1 Support,Email Support,Chat Support,L1,Business process,Email,Relationship
jobDescription:
Hi,


PFB Role & responsibilities:

  • Be a responsible member of the L1 Support Team.
  • Responsible for handling inbound and outbound calls and emails from customers and resolving their queries.
  • Responsible for coordinating with L2 support team to resolve issues faced by customers while using business applications
  • Provide end-to-end resolution to all open/unresolved user queries/grievances
  • Provide accurate, valid and complete information by using the right methods/tools like CRM
  • Conduct effective & regular training sessions for new joiners and for new customers
  • Meet personal/team targets and call handling etiquettes (FTR, AHT etc.)

Interested candidate please share your updated resume on email id - varsha.si@peoplefy.com

title: Tele Caller ,Admission Process,Carrier Counselling
tagsAndSkills: Admission Counselling,Student Counseling,Admissions,Career Counselling,Counselling,Education Counseling,Calling,Education
jobDescription:
JOB DESCRIPTION FOR Admission COunsellor

Title: Call Center Executive Admission Process

Open Positions: 4

Work Location: Dhirubhai Ambani International School, Bandra-Kurla Complex

Work Timings: General Shift – 8:00 am to 5:00 pm (rotation in this shift time for 9 hour shift and contractual job for 2 months only, extendable for 2 months more depends on work)

Responsibilities:

  • Handle inbound calls from prospective parents, providing detailed information about the school's admission process, eligibility criteria, curriculum, fees, and other relevant details.
  • Assist parents in completing the online application form, ensuring accuracy and completeness of all required information.
  • Address inquiries and resolve concerns promptly and professionally, ensuring a positive experience for all callers
  • Coordinate with various departments within the school to gather updated information about admission procedures, timelines, and other related matters.
  • Follow up with prospective parents via phone or email to provide updates on their application status or to request any additional documents if required.

Candidate Profile:

Experience:

  • 0-2 yrs. of relevant experience in admission counselling.

Qualification:

  • Any Graduate/Any Post-Graduate

Requirements:

  • Need to work in a school environment.
  • Good communication skills and confidence level.
  • Should be self-motivated as well as a team player.
  • Problem solving skills and multitasking ability.

Key Words: Admission Counselling, Education Counselling, Student Counselling, Carrier CounsellingRole & responsibilities



Preferred candidate profile



Perks and benefits

title: Urgent Opening: Video Editor at LetsUpgrade at Navi Mumbai
tagsAndSkills: Video Editing,Adobe Premiere Pro,Video Editor,Adobe After Effects,Video Production,Adobe Premiere,YouTube shorts,Creative Thinking

ambitionBoxData.Title: Itm Edutech Training Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Interested may apply to HR: Melissap@letsupgrade.in or hr@letsupgrade.in / 8591939769


  • About LetsUpgrade.in

#Job Essentials

  • Working Hours 11:00 PM to 08:00 PM
  • Place: Vashi, Navi Mumbai




Education and Experience:

- A degree or diploma in film editing, video production, or related field is preferred but not mandatory.

- Freshers with a compelling portfolio demonstrating skills in video editing and storytelling are welcome to apply.


Skills and Qualifications:


- Proficiency in Adobe After Effects and Adobe Premiere Pro is a must.

- Knowledge of DaVinci Resolve is a plus.

- Strong understanding of the latest trends in social media and digital content creation.

- Ability to work under tight deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

- Creative thinking and storytelling skills.

- Excellent communication and collaboration abilities.

- Attention to detail and a keen eye for aesthetics.

- A good sense of timing and visual awareness.



Key Responsibilities:


- Edit and assemble recorded footage into a finished project that matches the directors vision and is suitable for broadcasting.

- Work closely with our content team to create engaging videos for social media platforms, including reels, YouTube shorts, and long-format YouTube videos.

- Utilize creative storytelling techniques to enhance video content.

- Ensure the logical sequencing and smooth running of the final cut.

- Apply various editing techniques to adjust the pace, mood, and narrative flow of videos.

- Incorporate sound effects, music, graphics, and special effects as needed.

- Review shooting script and raw material to create a shot decision list based on scenes’ value and contribution to continuity.

- Experiment with styles and techniques, including the design of graphic elements.

- Suggest or select music and sound effects.

- Archive footage for future use.

jobDescription:
Dear Candidates......!!!!!!!!!!

PolicyBazaar is Hiring for Voice process -Mumbai & Pune...!!!!!!!!!!!!

What would be the roles and responsibilities

  • Assisting customers in sale of a range of financial products on call.
  • Reaching productivity that meets job standards, while working with speed and accuracy. Meeting and exceeding targets as assigned periodically.
  • Ability to learn about products and services and describe/explain them to prospects. Understanding customer requirement and closing sales.
  • Responding in a timely and effective manner to all internal communication. .

  • What we are looking for in a candidate
  • Should be Confident & Dynamic.
  • Should have a bent towards Sales.
  • Excellent interpersonal and listening skills
  • Good persuasion skill.
  • Should be efficient in converting customer interest into sales.
  • Good negotiation skills.
  • Team Player
  • Quick learner, creative and achiever.
  • Passionate about work output

Desired Skills and Experience-

  • HSC or higher education.
  • Fresher or Experience
  • Ability to communicate effectively Marathi & English.
  • Basic computer skills.
  • What do we offer?
  • Amazing work culture.
  • Complete Day shift.
  • 6 Day working
  • 1 Roster off
  • Unlimited Incentives
  • Good opportunity for career progression.

Interested candidates may please reach out to Himanshi at 9069719390 or share your CV on Whatsapp at 9069719390.


walk-in interviews at: (Mumbai)

Policybazaar.com, Unit no 101/201, 1st floor, Infinity Tower, Behind Toyota Showroom, Link Road, Malad (West) - 400064
